title: Leasing and Maintenance Coordinator - ResMan expert
job_overview:
Key Responsibilities:

Property Operations Support: Assist the onsite and back end team in overseeing the day-to-day operations of residential properties.

ResMan Reports: Assist in the preparation and customization of reports based on what the owners/management needs.

Marketing & Leasing: Backend assistance with marketing vacant units, conducting property showings, processing rental applications, and ensuring that the leasing process runs smoothly.

Vendor Management: Assist with vendor management, including securing bids for services, reviewing contracts, and ensuring vendors meet quality and service standards.

Compliance & Documentation: Ensure properties remain in compliance with local, state, and federal regulations. Maintain accurate and up-to-date property files and records.

Qualifications:

NON NEGOTIABLE: At least 2 years of proven experience with ResMan Software

Technical Skills: Proficient in Microsoft Office Suite (Excel, Word, PowerPoint).

Communication: Excellent written and verbal communication skills with the ability to interact effectively with tenants, vendors, and teaUpgrade to see actual infombers remotely.

Organizational Skills: Strong attention to detail, ability to manage multiple tasks simultaneously, and work independently in a remote environment.

Problem-Solving: Ability to address issues quickly and efficiently, with a customer service-oriented mindset.

Knowledge: Basic understanding of real estate laws, tenant-landlord regulations, and property maintenance procedures.

Remote Work Capability: Must have a reliable internet connection, home office setup, and the ability to work independently in a remote work environment.
